subtitle: Give skeletons physics!
description:
This pack makes it so that when any of the skeleton entities die, instead of falling over to the side like normal, they collapse into a pile of bones!

The entities this applies to are as follows:

  • Skeleton
  • Skeleton Horse
  • Stray
  • Wither Skeleton
  • The Wither
optifine: OptiFine is required so that entity models can be customised.
